body: good art and cute expressions, hope this gets translated soon

another GODLY tomiko-sama's doujin. I am once again convinced that good shota is better than good loli, but still average loli is better than average shota. that said, Gon and Killua are absolutely the best shota from one of the best anime. this doujin is highly hunterchad-approved.
@Otoka you'll love it even more when we translate this hopefully within a month

ALL OF THESE are 100% canon.
You cant change my mind.
KILLUAAA MY GAY SON FINALLY MAKING LOVE WITH HIS MAN love this artist and love how they include the scenes in certain arcs
